summary: With this mod you can get giant cudgel. But, it will not be just for this you need to kill Skarda the Winner of the Giants. Located to the North - East of Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=4]Description[/size][/u]
With this mod you can get a giant cudgel. But, it will not be easy for that you need to kill Skārda the winner of the giants. Located on the North - East of Whiterun

[u][size=4]Installation [/size][/u]
A normal installation. Copy the files in the folder Skyrim\Data. 
Run SkyrimLauncher. 
In the Files tab to tick the box against Scardwiner 
Installation is complete !

[u][size=4]Delete [/size][/u]
Run SkyrimLauncher. 
In the Files tab, remove the check against Scardwiner. 
From the folder Skyrim\Data. delete the mod files. 
The removal is complete !
author: Arseniy978
